concept.title: PGI 245.103-71 Transferring Government property accountability.

conbody.p: (1) Use only the Standard Form 30 to execute transfers of Government property accountability between existing contracts. No other forms or documents, such as the DD Form 1149, Requisition and Invoice/Shipping Document, are authorized for the transfer of Government property accountability from one contract to another.
(2) Modifications for the transfer of Government property accountability shall:
(i) Use the Government-furnished property (GFP) attachment prescribed at PGI 245.103-72 .

(ii) Incorporate FAR clauses 52.245-1, Government Property, and 52.245-9, Use and Charges, and the associated DFARS clauses (see 245.107, Contract clauses) to the extent that the gaining contract lacks the required clauses.
